price: (36) [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,[1828]
footnotes: [1828]- i.e., as a result of both their own righteous deeds and the limitless generosity of Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) . Another meaning is "a gift calculated [to be adequate]."
